overview:
As a member of a large corporate research and development facility, Iain Currie began working with Brickstream’s technology prototype in 1996. Iain has been with Brickstream since its inception and has been a significant contributor to its growth.

After creating and developing Brickstream’s implementation services team, Iain has since assumed responsibilities for all of Operations. His in-depth knowledge of Brickstream hardware, software, and implementation services continues to make an invaluable contribution to driving the future direction of Brickstream’s solutions.
